sentences.sentence: The World Food Programme suspends operations in Sudan after three of its staff members die in escalating violence between rival military forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Rescue operations continue in Slovyansk as the death toll from Friday's missile strike rises to 11.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Heavy fighting continued in the Sudanese capital Khartoum on Sunday,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: with flashpoints elsewhere in what is one of the country's worst escalations of violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: At least 56 civilians have died and 400 others have been injured as rival factions battle for control of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The UN's World Food Programme says it's temporarily suspended its humanitarian work

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: after three of its staff members were killed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: WFP chief Cindy McCain tweeted that aid workers should never be a target and that all parties must agree on their safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Sudanese armed forces and its former allies, the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces Group, are fighting after tensions broke out over a proposed transition to civilian rule. This after the military vowed to dismantle the group. UN Secretary General Antonia Guterres and other top diplomats have strongly condemned the fighting that threatens to destabilize much of the region. Rescue operations are continuing in Ukraine's eastern city of Slovyansk after a Russian missile strike on Friday that killed at least 11 people, including a toddler.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's air force said the Patriot air defense system, which the United States is expected to deliver soon, would help prevent such attacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: On Saturday, President Zelensky introduced further sanctions against some 700 Russian and Belarusian businesses and citizens.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Moscow claims assault units of the Wagner mercenary group have captured two neighborhoods in the northern and southern suburbs of Bakhmut.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Kremlin also accuses retreating Ukrainian troops of destroying city infrastructure and residential buildings to slow the advance of Russian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The G7 has pledged to accelerate the phase-out of fossil fuels, but failed to agree an exact date to end polluting power sources such as coal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: After two days of talks in Sapporo, Japan, the bloc's environment and energy ministers issued a 36-page document laying out their commitments ahead of a G7 summit in May.G7サミットを前に行うことについて、 彼らは明年のプラスチックについて、 The group of seven industrialized nations account for 40% of the world's economic activity and a quarter of global carbon emissions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A daring stunt over the Danube. In Budapest, multi-award winning high wire artist Laszlo

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Simic Junior became the first person to cross Europe's second longest river by tightrope.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The spectacle marked the grand opening of the 10th International Theatre Olympics. It symbolises that we have overcome our cultural values. What is art after Covid in a war?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It is like the values that our fathers and grandfathers received.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We take them to the other side, we overcome them and give them to our children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: We give them to the last generation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Teamwork makes a miracle.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: While the sun failed to make an appearance, the stunt star said he was relieved that the wind and the rain held off too.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The main concern was how much the wind would blow the rudder into my hand.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The cameras, the reinforced cameras, give extra space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The rudder itself was light, although it was in shows with the Cirque du Soleil and played an important role in the 2012 London Olympic and Paralympic closing ceremonies. India's International Theatre Olympics runs from 15th April to 24th June.
